description:
A sweaty back can be a thing of the past. This day hiking pack has a suspended open-air mesh backpanel for maximum airflow on hot days. Multiple pockets keep you organized and the hydration-ready design and tube routing ensure water is always close-at-hand.

  • FreeSpan suspended open-air mesh backpanel keeps you cool and comfortable on the trail
  • Airy mesh on shoulder straps for comfort, with hydration tube routing
  • Adjustable sternum strap with integrated safety whistle
  • Internal SpeedClip accommodates up to a 3L hydration bladder (sold separately)
  • Removable webbing waistbelt
  • Zippered side stash pocket has key clip attachment
  • 2 stretch water bottle pockets and a front bungee to secure extra layers
  • Designed for loads up to 6.8kg
  • Plus Size packs are designed with extended length shoulder straps and hip belts, plus a revised fit to accommodate larger body shapes and sizes
  • Fits hips up to 152cm
name: Gregory Arrio 22 Plus Size Daypack - Unisex
